title: Trace route spike at hetzner
body:
So i traced the route to the league server and this happened, i know it isnt league's problem but i was wondering if anybody is facing the same problem.. or if anybody has any info about hetzner..
http://i.imgur.com/aU0fqqP.png

replies.body:
Unfortunately, I don't have any specific information about hetzner.  Given the huge increase in ping in your tracert, you may want to consider reaching out to your ISP to see if there is anything they can do on their end to possibly help with this particular issue.  Additionally, even though it is inherently unstable, you may want to try using a VPN to get a different network path to the servers to see if it bypasses this specific issue.

I hope this helps!
